name: Alice Waters

recipes.cooking_method: 1. Brown chicken and bacon in a Dutch oven. 2. Add onions and carrots. 3. Pour in red wine and simmer for 2 hours. 4. Serve with crusty bread.
1. Saute fennel and onion in olive oil. 2. Add tomatoes and saffron. 3. Pour in fish stock and bring to a boil. 4. Add fish and shellfish. 5. Serve with rouille and crusty bread.
1. Saute garlic and onion in olive oil. 2. Add eggplant, zucchini, and bell peppers. 3. Add chopped tomatoes and simmer for 30 minutes. 4. Serve hot or cold.
